text:
Paige Hauschild (born August 17, 1999) is an American water polo player. She was part of the gold medal-winning American team at the 2017 World Aquatics Championships in Budapest. She participated at the 2016 FINA Women’s Water Polo World Youth Championships, 2018 FINA World Cup, and 2019 Pan American Games.
She played for University of Southern California's women's water polo team for the 2018 NCAA Champion season.

annotations.surface_form: 2016 FINA Women’s Water Polo World Youth Championships
